body:
Hello guys,  Is it possible to use the ray tracing definition for multiple hrs and minutes, lets say covering a time span of full 4hrs? 

[http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&amp...;](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Ray_tracing&slide=0&scale=5.4718930747502865&offset=-3246.6789215534122,-538.4855846988982) Thanks.

replies.body: Yes. You just need to generate the sun vectors for the desired hours.
